official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit insured depository institutions from imposing any fees with respect to certain deposits of rolled coins by individuals who are not more than 16 years of age.

summary.text: Youth Depositor Protection Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit an insured depository institution from imposing any fee in connection with the deposit of rolled U.S. coins by an accountholder who is less than 16 years of age.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit insured depository institutions from imposing any fees with respect to certain deposits of rolled coins by individuals who are not more than 16 years of age.
